attributes.label: aria-label
attributes.description: Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.

attributes.label: color
attributes.description: The color to use for the background of the item.

attributes.label: flip-rtl
attributes.description: Specifies whether the icon should horizontally flip when `dir` is `"rtl"`.

attributes.label: icon
attributes.description:
A combination of both `name` and `src`. If a `src` url is detected
it will set the `src` property. Otherwise it assumes it's a built-in named
SVG and set the `name` property.

attributes.label: ios
attributes.description: Specifies which icon to use on `ios` mode.

attributes.label: lazy
attributes.description:
If enabled, ion-icon will be loaded lazily when it's visible in the viewport.
Default, `false`.

attributes.label: md
attributes.description: Specifies which icon to use on `md` mode.

attributes.label: mode
attributes.description:
The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.

attributes.label: name
attributes.description: Specifies which icon to use from the built-in set of icons.

attributes.label: size
attributes.description:
The size of the icon.
Available options are: `"small"` and `"large"`.

attributes.label: src
attributes.description: Specifies the exact `src` of an SVG file to use.
